law.catch_line: Enforcement of provisions of KRS 367.842 to 367.844 by Attorney General.
law.text: Noncompliance with the provisions of KRS 367.842 to 367.844 by a manufacturer shall be unlawful. The Attorney General shall have authority to enforce KRS 367.842 to 367.844 in accordance with powers provided by KRS 367.190 and 367.230, pertaining to acts declared unlawful by KRS 367.170. Any expenses accruing to the Attorney General from the provisions of KRS 367.842 to 367.844 shall be assessed by his office upon the motor vehicle manufacturer involved in any action cited in the provisions herein.
law.history: Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 387, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1986.
